page.title: 12LOCAL BUTTERLEIGH EVENTS
page.content: Many of the events in Butterleigh are connected with the Church and raising money to repair it. The Butterleigh{Harvest Home}takes place in September and it is one of the main events in the local calendar. There is a flower show,vegetable competition,art and craft competitions,races for the children and a Cross Country.A marquee is put up where they have a Devonshire Cream Tea and then there is a dance with a bar until the early hours of the morning. They run an{Autumn}or{Christmas {Fair}in aid of the Church and also{ {Garden Parties}in the Summer. Every two years they have a{Donkey {Derby}called the{Butterleigh Races.} All entrance fees go for charity and the children are the jockeys.
